taper.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to become gradually narrower towards one end, or to make something become narrower at one end
taper.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: His wide chest tapers to a small waist.
taper.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a piece of string covered in wax, used for lighting lamps, candles etc
taper.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: The box contained a taper to light each firework.
